scores.description: Score of 1 indicates you have not run any workshops
Score of 2 indicates you ran one workshop and ran the consultant out
Score of 3 indicates you value the internal organization workshop
Score of 4 indicates you run regular workshops
Score of 5 indicates you are the best organization
Score of 1 indicates you have not run any 3rd party workshops
Score of 2 indicates you ran one workshop and ran the 3rd party out
Score of 3 indicates you value the 3rd party workshops
Score of 4 indicates you interact regularly with 3rd parties
Score of 5 indicates you and third parties are partners
